body.raw:
publisher:
  name: Publisher A
  description: PubA Description
  publicationYear: 2018
vocabularyStructureSpecs:
  - tokenType: TERM
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 11
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 176
        blue: 80
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
  - tokenType: GRAMMAR_TYPE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 11
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: true
      pattern: "(^\\(v\\)|^\\(n\\)|^\\(phr v\\)|^\\(adj\\)).*"
      compositeSpecs:
        parts:
          - "GRAMMAR_TYPE"
          - "VERB_PARTICIPLES"
        splitPattern: "\\s\\("
  - tokenType: TRANSLATION
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 11
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: GREEK
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "[-,\\s\\p{InGreek}]+"
  - tokenType: EXAMPLE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 11
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: true
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
vocabularyStructureTransitions:
  - "TERM -> GRAMMAR_TYPE"
  - "TERM -> TRANSLATION"
  - "GRAMMAR_TYPE -> TRANSLATION"
  - "TRANSLATION -> EXAMPLE"
  - "EXAMPLE -> TERM"
vocabularySpeechPartMappings:
  (n): NOUN
  (v): VERB
  (adj): ADJECTIVE

publisher:
  name: Publisher B
  description: Publisher B's Description
  publicationYear: 2017
vocabularyStructureSpecs:
  - tokenType: TERM
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 11
      color:
        red: 75
        green: 172
        blue: 198
      italicized: false
      bold: true
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
  - tokenType: PRONUNCIATION
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 11
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
  - tokenType: GRAMMAR_TYPE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: true
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
  - tokenType: TRANSLATION
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
vocabularyStructureTransitions:
  - "TERM -> PRONUNCIATION"
  - "PRONUNCIATION -> GRAMMAR_TYPE"
  - "GRAMMAR_TYPE -> TRANSLATION"
  - "TRANSLATION -> TERM"
vocabularySpeechPartMappings:
  N.: NOUN
  adj.: ADJECTIVE

publisher:
  name: Our World
  description: Publisher Description for Our World
  publicationYear: 2015
vocabularyStructureSpecs:
  - tokenType: TERM
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 140
        green: 86
        blue: 67
      italicized: false
      bold: true
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: true
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "^[a-zA-Z0-9\\s\\(\\)\\\\.]*$"
  - tokenType: GRAMMAR_TYPE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: true
      pattern: "(^\\(v\\)|^\\(n\\)|^\\(phr v\\)|^\\(adj\\)|^\\(adv\\)).*"
      compositeSpecs:
        parts:
          - "GRAMMAR_TYPE"
          - "VERB_PARTICIPLES"
        splitPattern: "\\s\\("
  - tokenType: TRANSLATION
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: GREEK
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "[-,\\(\\)\\\\.\\s\\p{InGreek}]+"
  - tokenType: EXAMPLE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: true
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: true
      potentiallyComposite: false
  - tokenType: DERIVATIVES
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "Der:[\\sa-zA-Z\\(\\)]+"
  - tokenType: OPPOSITES
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "Opp:[\\sa-zA-Z\\(\\)]+"
vocabularyStructureTransitions:
  - "TERM -> GRAMMAR_TYPE"
  - "TERM -> TRANSLATION"
  - "GRAMMAR_TYPE -> TRANSLATION"
  - "TRANSLATION -> EXAMPLE"
  - "EXAMPLE -> OPPOSITES"
  - "EXAMPLE -> DERIVATIVES"
  - "EXAMPLE -> TERM"
  - "DERIVATIVES -> OPPOSITES"
  - "OPPOSITES -> DERIVATIVES"
  - "DERIVATIVES -> TERM"
  - "OPPOSITES -> TERM"
vocabularySpeechPartMappings:
  (n): NOUN
  (v): VERB
  (adj): ADJECTIVE
  (adv): ADVERB
  (phr v): PHRASAL_VERB

publisher:
  name: GE
  description: Publisher GE Description
  publicationYear: 2018
vocabularyStructureSpecs:
  - tokenType: TERM
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 9
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: true
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      pattern: "^[-a-zA-Z0-9\\s\\']*$"
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      minWords: 1
      maxWords: 3
  - tokenType: PRONUNCIATION
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 9
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: true
      compositeSpecs:
        parts:
          - "PRONUNCIATION"
          - "GRAMMAR_TYPE"
          - "TRANSLATION"
        splitPattern: "[/=]"
  - tokenType: EXAMPLE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 8
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: true
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: true
      potentiallyComposite: false
  - tokenType: PHRASE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 9
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      pattern: "^[a-zA-Z0-9\\s\\/\\/\\:\\']*$"
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      minWords: 3
      maxWords: 100
  - tokenType: DERIVATIVES
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 9
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "^.*(\\(n\\)|\\(v\\)).*$"
  - tokenType: TRANSLATION
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 9
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: GREEK
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "[-,\\(\\)\\\\.\\s\\p{InGreek}]+"
  - tokenType: SYNONYMS
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "Syn:[\\sa-zA-Z\\(\\)]+"
vocabularyStructureTransitions:
  - "TERM -> PRONUNCIATION"
  - "PRONUNCIATION -> EXAMPLE"
  - "EXAMPLE -> DERIVATIVES"
  - "EXAMPLE -> TRANSLATION"
  - "DERIVATIVES -> TRANSLATION"
  - "TRANSLATION -> SYNONYMS"
  - "TRANSLATION -> TERM"
  - "TRANSLATION -> PHRASE"
  - "SYNONYMS -> TERM"
  - "PHRASE -> TERM"
vocabularySpeechPartMappings:
  (n): NOUN
  (v): VERB
  (adj): ADJECTIVE
  (adv): ADVERB
  (phr v): PHRASAL_VERB

publisher:
  name: Pub-E
  description: Publisher E Description
  publicationYear: 2019
vocabularyStructureSpecs:
  - tokenType: TERM
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: true
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      pattern: "^[-?a-zA-Z0-9\\s\\/\\/\\:\\'\\(\\)]*$"
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: true
      potentiallyComposite: false
      minWords: 1
      maxWords: 4
  - tokenType: GRAMMAR_TYPE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: false
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "(^\\(v\\)|^\\(n\\)|^\\(phr v\\)|^\\(adj\\)).*"
  - tokenType: TRANSLATION
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 10
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: false
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: GREEK
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: true
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "[-/;,\\(\\)\\\\.\\s\\p{InGreek}]+"
  - tokenType: EXAMPLE
    rtfSpecs:
      textPoints: 9
      color:
        red: 0
        green: 0
        blue: 0
      italicized: true
      bold: false
    tokenTypeSpecs:
      language: ENGLISH
      potentiallyLast: true
      potentiallySplit: false
      potentiallyComposite: false
      pattern: "^[-a-zA-Z0-9â€™,\\s\\/\\/\\:\\'\"\\?!\\\\.]*$"
      minWords: 5
      maxWords: 100
vocabularyStructureTransitions:
  - "TERM -> GRAMMAR_TYPE"
  - "TERM -> TRANSLATION"
  - "GRAMMAR_TYPE -> TRANSLATION"
  - "TRANSLATION -> EXAMPLE"
  - "TRANSLATION -> TERM"
  - "EXAMPLE -> TERM"
vocabularySpeechPartMappings:
  (n): NOUN
  (v): VERB
  (adj): ADJECTIVE
  (adv): ADVERB
  (phr v): PHRASAL_VERB

item.name: Process RTF document for Pub A

body.raw:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset161 Calibri;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green176\blue80;}
{\*\generator Riched20 6.2.9200}\viewkind4\uc1 
\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\f0\fs18\lang9 18.1\fs22\tab\cf1 frog \cf0 (n) \f1\lang1032\'e2\'dc\'f4\'f1\'e1\'f7\'ef\'f2\par
\tab\i\f0\lang1033 Frogs are small green animals.\par
\i0\fs18 18.2\fs22\tab\cf1 fry \cf0 (v) \f1\lang1032\'f4\'e7\'e3\'e1\'ed\'df\'e6\'f9\par
\tab\i\f0\lang1033 Let's fry an egg for breakfast.\par
\i0\fs18 18.3\fs22\tab\cf1 oil \cf0 (n) \f1\lang1032\'eb\'dc\'e4\'e9\par
\tab\i\f0\lang1033 We fry food in oil.\par
\i0\fs18 18.4\fs22\tab\cf1 easy \cf0 (adj) \f1\lang1032\'e5\'fd\'ea\'ef\'eb\'ef\'f2, -\'e7, -\'ef\par
\f0\lang1033\tab\i You can do the maths homework. It is easy!\lang9\par
}
